articles.title: This 'tipping point' would be catastrophic for Europe but scientists are unsure when we'll reach it - Euronews
articles.description: It would mean severe global climate repercussions, with Europe bearing the brunt of the consequences.
articles.content:
It would mean severe global climate repercussions, with Europe bearing the brunt of the consequences.
